column5: Beautiful new townhouse. Full equipped kitchen w micro, pots/pans, utensils; free TV & highspeed Internet. AC. 3 min to TAMU & restaurants. Parking. 4 bdrms, 2 up/2 down-each with private bath. Washer/dryer. Brand new furniture and beds. Handicapped accessible. Excellent condition. Ideal for game weekends or longer. Pet friendly; dog walking park next street over. Please notify us if you are bringing a pet; pet damage/security deposit required.
column8: College Station New Townhouse Close to TAMU
